inclusion.criterion: Hemiplegic patients demonstrating weakness of scapular muscles i.e., less than grade 3 on manual muscle testing scale.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Hemiplegics who understand and follow verbal commands.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Hemiplegic patient with cognitive and perceptual disorders.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Hemiplegic patient having sensory, behavioral dysfunction and emotional liability.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Participating in any experimental rehabilitation or drug studies.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine, complicated by severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention. The tumor is unresectable and patient has received radiation therapy.
